# External Links

This repo is the control plane. The AI Empire knowledgebase lives in the OpenClaw workspace.

- `external/ai-empire` points to: `/Users/maurice/.openclaw/workspace/ai-empire`
- `external/claude-bridge` points to: `/Users/maurice/.openclaw/workspace/ai-empire/CLAUDE_BRIDGE`

Use cases:
- Read/write shared artifacts from Codex and automation.
- Export drafts into `external/ai-empire/04_OUTPUT/content_pipeline/drafts/` for the X scheduler.
